text: Nicholas Cheong Jin-suk (; 7 December 1931 â€“ 27 April 2021) was a South Korean Cardinal of the Roman Catholic Church. He was Archbishop of Seoul from 1998 until he retired in 2012. He was previously Bishop of Cheongju from 1970 to 1998. He was made a cardinal in 2006. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Cardinals of the Roman Catholic Church Category:People from Seoul Category:South Korean Roman Catholic bishops
